headline: MSTR Stock Breaks Above 20-Day Moving Average on MSCI Win. Should You Buy Shares Here?
summary: MicroStrategy stock gains as MSCI confirms plans of retaining digital asset treasury firms within its global indexes. But MSTR shares aren’t out of the woods just yet.

headline: Does MSCI’s Options Venue Shift and Crypto-Treasury Stance Change The Bull Case For MSCI (MSCI)?
summary: In January 2026, the New York Stock Exchange, part of Intercontinental Exchange, agreed that NYSE Arca and NYSE American will become the U.S. options listing venues for major MSCI indexes, while MSCI also confirmed it will keep digital asset treasury companies in its Global Investable Market Indexes for the February 2026 review. Together, these moves reinforce MSCI’s role at the center of global portfolio construction and risk management, while clarifying its stance on digital asset-heavy...

headline: MSTR Sees Dip Buying Amid MSCI Reprieve — Can This ‘Strategy’ Help Avoid a 13% Dip?
summary: MSTR stock is seeing dip buyers return after the MSCI reprieve, but capital flows tell a more cautious story. Is this rebound built to last?

headline: Bitcoin Falls, Strategy Wavers After Negative MSCI Rule
summary: Equity index manager MSCI will let Strategy and other digital asset treasury firms stay in its global indices for now, but it announced a new rule that could make it harder for them to buy bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.  MSCI said it won't count new shares issued by Strategy and other digital asset treasury firms, keeping their index weightings from growing as they issue more shares to buy bitcoin.  MSTR stock jumped after the MSCI news, but the bitcoin price has undercut its pre-announcement level.

raw.headline: Bitcoin Falls, Strategy Wavers After Negative MSCI Rule
raw.summary: Equity index manager MSCI will let Strategy and other digital asset treasury firms stay in its global indices for now, but it announced a new rule that could make it harder for them to buy bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.  MSCI said it won't count new shares issued by Strategy and other digital asset treasury firms, keeping their index weightings from growing as they issue more shares to buy bitcoin.  MSTR stock jumped after the MSCI news, but the bitcoin price has undercut its pre-announcement level.

headline: 3 Financials Stocks We Find Risky
summary: Financial providers use their expertise in capital allocation and risk assessment to help facilitate economic growth while offering consumers and businesses essential financial services. Still, investors are uneasy as companies face challenges from an unpredictable interest rate and inflation environment. These doubts have certainly contributed to the indutry's recent underperformance - over the past six months, its 6% gain has fallen behind the S&P 500's 11.5% rise.

headline: A Look At Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) Valuation After Record 2025 Volumes And Expanded MSCI Options Deal
summary: Intercontinental Exchange (ICE) is in focus after reporting record 2025 trading volumes across several asset classes, and after expanding its long running MSCI partnership with a new U.S. options listings agreement on key benchmark indexes. See our latest analysis for Intercontinental Exchange.
